title: Unknown Directx error
body: Sometimes I am getting  Unknown Directx error.. and the only solution is to restart my computer. It happens after a game starts. I played few games and then my next game didn't start.

replies.body: Something might have gone a little wrong with your DirectX update files if you keep seeing that type of error randomly. Check out this guide on [**finding the best DX drivers**](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/179113/how-to-install-the-latest-version-of-directx) for your OS, and let me know if those steps are able to help.
